articles.title: Lowdb is awesome
articles.lead: Lowdb is a database library for node, which uses json as a database.
articles.body:
Lowdb is perfect for CLIs, small servers, Electron apps and npm packages in general.

It supports Node, the browser and uses lodash API, so it's very simple to learn. Actually, if you know Lodash, you already know how to use lowdb ðŸ˜‰

comments.text: I like modifying global variables ðŸ˜Š
